content: Is there a way to return a measure report with disaggregated and grouped by facility for each of the disaggregations? I have the CQL library returning age/sex disaggregation, this works fine for one facility. I have been exploring using Patient.location in measure as supplemental data, but this only returns totals for and not as per CQL disaggregates. Anyone one has done this before or can think of a workaround?
